content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) NEW YORK  November 17 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has withdrawn the 'D' Long-Term Issuer Default Ratings (IDRs) for Toys 'R' Us  Inc.  Toys 'R' Us-Delaware  Inc.  Toys 'R' Us Property Co. I  LLC  and TRU Taj LLC. Given Toys' Chapter 11 filing on Sept. 18  2017  Fitch will no longer provide ratings or analytical coverage for the company. RATING SENSITIVITIES Rating sensitivities are not applicable in light of the ratings being withdrawn. Conta
name: Adobe Systems Incorporated
title: Fitch Withdraws Toys 'R' Us IDR
